issue.title: [Python] Create buffer from address, size and base
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2252](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2252). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Given a memory address and a size, we should be able to construct an Arrow buffer from this. The additional base object will be used to hold a reference to the underlying, original buffer so that it does not go out of scope before the Arrow buffer.
